#summary How to use JSPackCrx in your web app.


= Documentation =


== Embedding the script ==

  * Link to jspackcrx_include.js as an external script, whether on your own server or on the project site at http://jspackcrx.googlecode.com/svn/branches/stable/jspackcrx_include.js for the latest version.
  * You may choose to load the script asynchronously, but make sure you don't call JSPackCrx before it loads!
